00033 #define LCD_CLOCK_PORT      PORTD

00035 
00036 #define LCD_PIN_DATA        5             
00037 #define LCD_PIN_CLOCK       6             
00038 #define LCD_PIN_E           7             
00039 
00040 #define LCD_ON              0x0C          
00041 #define LCD_OFF             0x08          
00042 #define LCD_CURSOR_ON       0x0A          
00043 #define LCD_CURSOR_OFF      0x08          
00044 #define LCD_CURSOR_BLINK    0x09          
00045 #define LCD_CURSOR_NOBLINK  0x08          
00046

00048 #define LCD_HOME            0x02
